replies.body:
[
](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/huntan) You need to change the "File Path" of Weather file. Like this post: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/energy-simu...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/energy-simulation-errors-1) -Omid
